ISSUE.TITLE: Move the registration of core event types to the app config
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Several event types are registered in `core.events`. We should move the registration under the `ready()` method of CoreConfig. ### Justification The `core.events` module serves primarily to declare the various object and job event types, which need to be imported from elsewhere in the application, typically very early in the initialization process. The registration of these events should be deferred until the application has finished initializing.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19035: Move the registration of core event types to the app config
Closes #19035: Move the registration of core event types to the app config (#19088)
